name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Janet L. KRAMER, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Janet L. KRAMER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

opinions.text:
CAPPY, J.,
files a dissenting opinion in which CASTILLE, J., joins.*
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: CAPPY, J.,

attorneys: Caroline M. Roberto, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Sandra Preuhs, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
650 A.2d 870
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Janet L. KRAMER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Sept. 20, 1994.
Decided Nov. 22, 1994.
Caroline M. Roberto, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Sandra Preuhs, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
